001package net.tvburger.jdl.perceptron;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Floats;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.LastInputStoredNeuron;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.NeuronFunction;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.ObjectiveFunction;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Optimizer;
009
010import java.util.Arrays;
011
012public class PerceptronUpdateRule implements Optimizer.Stochastic<Perceptron, Float> {
013
014    @Override
015    public void optimize(Perceptron perceptron, DataSet.Sample<Float> sample, ObjectiveFunction<Float> objective, int step) {
016        Float[] estimate = perceptron.estimate(sample.features());
017        for (int i = 0; i < estimate.length; i++) {
018            int sign = Floats.greaterThan(sample.targetOutputs()[i], 0.0f) ? +1 : -1;
019            LastInputStoredNeuron neuron = perceptron.getNeuron(2, i, LastInputStoredNeuron.class);
020            if (!Floats.equals(sample.targetOutputs()[i], estimate[i])) {
021                System.out.println("Training: real = " + Arrays.toString(sample.targetOutputs()) + " estimated = " + Arrays.toString(estimate) + ": features = " + Arrays.toString(sample.features()));
022                System.out.println("Sample target output = " + sample.targetOutputs()[i] + ", sign = " + sign);
023                updateParameters(neuron, sign);
024            }
025        }
026    }
027
028    private void updateParameters(LastInputStoredNeuron neuron, float y) {
029        NeuronFunction neuronFunction = neuron.getNeuronFunction();
030        neuronFunction.adjustParameter(0, y);
031        for (int d = 1; d < neuron.arity(); d++) {
032            neuronFunction.adjustParameter(d, y * neuron.getStoredInput(d));
033        }
034        System.out.println(neuron);
035    }
036}
